name: Narasimha
title: Data Analyst
about: A results-driven analyst with 2.5+ years of experience in marketing, business intelligence, and automation. Skilled in Python, SQL, and Power BI with a strong foundation in report building, NLP, and performance tracking.

projects.title: ROMI Power BI Dashboard
projects.description: Created a ROMI dashboard by integrating sales, revenue, and campaign spend from ADF using optimized SQL. Improved reporting efficiency by 70% and enhanced insights delivery with UX improvements.

projects.title: VOC Market Competitor Analysis
projects.description: Scraped and analyzed article data from 12 competitors using Python, Pandas, and Selenium. Mapped keywords to industries and built Power BI dashboards to visualize MoM trends and competitor strategy.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed 100K+ reviews using NLTK and TextBlob to identify sentiment distribution and UI/support issues. Helped optimize product and marketing, leading to a 15% sales increase.

projects.title: Cohort Analysis
projects.description: Performed retention analysis across customer cohorts and purchase timings. Early purchasers showed 20% higher lifetime value, informing customer strategy.

projects.title: SOV (Share of Voice) Analysis
projects.description: Conducted keyword analysis across 100+ search terms to refine marketing strategy and increase website traffic by 15%.

projects.title: Report Automation
projects.description: Automated daily/weekly/monthly reports for ad platforms using Python and SQL. Reduced manual workload by 10+ hours/week and improved reporting consistency.
